page.title: 14GAMES CHILDREN PLAY
page.content: The 6-14 age group of children have a variety of games which they play in the playground and around their homes.In Spring the main attraction for boys is football, and older girls may like to join in this.The favourite games are the different forms of tig which involve one or more catchers e.g.chain tig where the children join hands when caught and run about in a line;hospital tig where they hold the part of the body touched by the catcher;aeroplane tig where they stand with arms outstretched when caught but can be freed by someone running under their arms.Other games are Hounds and Hares,Hide and Seek,Rounders and Marbles.
